scripts.start: npm run build && (tsc --watch & npm run serve & npm run watch:css)
scripts.dev: npm run build && (trap 'kill 0' SIGINT SIGTERM; tsc --watch & npm run serve & npm run watch:css & wait)
scripts.postbuild: tailwindcss -i ./src/styles/input.css -o ./dist/styles.css && npm run copy:html && npm run copy:server
